alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 22 at 3:24PM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in valleys with 6 to 18+ inches possible in mountains. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern Nye County. * WHEN...From Friday morning through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
